text:
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
                    SUPPRESSED MEMORY
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Her name was Sarah.

You remember now. How could you have forgotten?

The coffee shop. The way she laughed. The way she looked at you.

The last time you saw her, she was walking toward the woods.

You called out. She turned. Smiled.

"I'll be right back," she said.

She never came back.

And you never told anyone.

Why didn't you tell anyone?

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
